channel.title: Console on Harecoded
channel.description: Recent content in Console on Harecoded

item.title: Force kill of processes in Windows
item.description: Sometimes Windows Tasks Manager is not able to kill an in-memory process. We try to close it several times with no luck :( For these frustration moments we can make use of a console command named TaskKill With TaskKill the pain ends simply with: taskkill /IM filename.exe /F More info about taskkill: http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc725602.aspx
